# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="8fc91-102">Trajno brisanje e-pošte u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8fc91-103">Ako želite da izbrišete e-poštu ili ispraznite prijemno poštansko sanduče:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8fc91-104">Izaberite poruke koje želite da izbrišete (ili izaberite krug</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8fc91-105">pored **prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta** na vrhu liste poruka da biste izabrali sve poruke u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8fc91-106">Na vrhu stranice izaberite stavku **Izbriši** (za celu fasciklu, **praznu fasciklu**ili **prazno fokusirano**na  /  **prazno drugo** ako imate omogućeno fokusirano Prijemno sanduče).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8fc91-107">Da biste očistili sve izbrisane e-poruke, otvorite [fasciklu "Izbrisane stavke"](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) i izaberite stavku **prazna fascikla**, a zatim izaberite stavku **otvorene stavke** na vrhu stranice i ponovo izaberite stavku **prazna fascikla** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8fc91-108">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte stavke [Brisanje e-pošte u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8fc91-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
